name: Super Robot - War Game
description:
You control a giant humanoid warrior! The General has sent his army to eliminate you! Get ready to take on countless waves of enemies, including ground troops, helicopters, tanks and more!

This is a one-woman mech powered assault on an entire military force. Guns, bombs, rocket launchers, tanks, paras, choppers, big bosses - General G.I will throw everything at you including the kitchen sink!
